slides.title: Welcome to Technology and Analytics
slides.content:
# Technology and Analytics

Part 1F covers **technology** and **data analytics**.

## What You Will Learn

- **Information Systems** - IT fundamentals
- **Data Analytics** - Analysis tools
- **Visualization** - Dashboards
- **Emerging Tech** - New technologies

## Topics

| Area | Focus |
|------|-------|
| Information systems | ERP, databases |
| Data analytics | Tools, techniques |
| Visualization | Dashboards |
| Technology trends | AI, blockchain |

slides.title: Information Systems
slides.content:
# IT Architecture

| System | Purpose |
|--------|--------|

| DSS | Decision support |

```
Integrated modules:

- Sales
```

slides.title: Database Concepts
slides.content:
# Data Management

## Database Types

| Type | Structure |
|------|----------|
| Relational | Tables, SQL |
| NoSQL | Flexible schema |
| Data warehouse | Analytics |
| Data lake | Raw data |

## Data Warehouse

```
Extract -> Transform -> Load (ETL)

Source systems -> Staging -> Warehouse
```

## Data Quality

| Dimension | Meaning |
|-----------|--------|
| Accuracy | Correct values |
| Completeness | All data present |
| Timeliness | Current |
| Consistency | Same across sources |

slides.title: Data Analytics Methods
slides.content:
# Analytics Types

## Analytics Spectrum

| Type | Question |
|------|----------|
| Descriptive | What happened? |
| Diagnostic | Why did it happen? |
| Predictive | What will happen? |
| Prescriptive | What should we do? |

## Descriptive Analytics

- Aggregation
- Summarization
- Trending
- KPI reporting

## Predictive Analytics

- Forecasting
- Machine learning
- Statistical modeling
- Regression

slides.title: Statistical Analysis
slides.content:
# Statistical Tools

## Descriptive Statistics

| Measure | Purpose |
|---------|--------|
| Mean | Average |
| Median | Middle value |
| Mode | Most frequent |
| Std deviation | Spread |

## Correlation

```
Correlation coefficient (r):
+1 = Perfect positive
0 = No relationship
-1 = Perfect negative
```

## Regression

```
Y = a + bX

Y = Dependent variable
a = Intercept
b = Slope
X = Independent variable
```

slides.title: Robotic Process Automation
slides.content:
# RPA

## What is RPA?

Software robots automate repetitive tasks.

## RPA Applications

| Process | Automation |
|---------|------------|
| Data entry | Form filling |
| Reconciliations | Matching |
| Report generation | Scheduled reports |
| Invoice processing | Extraction |

## Benefits

| Benefit | Impact |
|---------|--------|
| Efficiency | Faster processing |
| Accuracy | Fewer errors |
| Cost savings | Lower labor |
| Scalability | Handle volume |

## Implementation

- Identify processes
- Design bots
- Test and deploy
- Monitor performance

slides.content:
# Blockchain Technology

## Key Concepts

| Concept | Meaning |
|---------|--------|
| Distributed ledger | Shared database |

| Immutability | Cannot change |

| Smart contracts | Automated execution |
| Audit trail | Verification |
| Payments | Cryptocurrency |

## Benefits

- Transparency
- Security
- Efficiency
- Trust
